posts.title: hexo note
posts.text: Hexo搭建 在Mac OS 安装node.js LTS版本 终端切换至root 1sudo su 安装hexo框架12npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.orgcnpm install -g hexo-cli 4.创建初始化 1sudo hexo init 5.启动预览 1hexo s 端口 localhost:4000 6.新建文章 1hexo new '' 7.生成文章 12hexo cleanhexo g 8.部署至github，修改_config.yml文件中deployment 1cnpm install --save hexo-deployer-git 修改完成后部署 1hexo d 初次使用 12git config --global user.name'TXanthe'git config --global user.email'xanthett@gmail.com' ref www.bilibili.com/video/av44544186

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
